vclaim: Attorney Lin Wood toured the White House in April 2021 looking for U.S. President Joe Biden, but found former President Donald Trump instead, while Biden remained missing and possibly dead.
title: Did Lin Wood Find Trump at White House and Biden Missing?
subtitle: A series of bizarre images posted to Telegram in April 2021 by the QAnon-supporting attorney appeared to reference a stale conspiracy theory.
author: Nur Ibrahim
